Class HeroSetupSCREEN

  • java.lang.Object
    • HeroSetupSCREEN

  • public class HeroSetupSCREEN
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class provides the GUI for the User setup the Team by inputing Hero Names and Hero Types for each Hero in the Team.
    Author:
    Sachin Sakthivel and Sasiru Goonatillake Date: May 18th 2018

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      HeroSetupSCREEN​(GameEnvironment newGame)
      Create the application.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void closeSCREEN​()
      Closes up the frame and clears up this instance of HeroSetupScreen
      void createHero​()
      This method creates Heroes based on the input given to it by variable typePick and heroName, and adds them to the Team
      void finishedWindow​()
      This method calls closeSetupScreen of GameEnvironment class which closes the HeroSetupSCREEN using closeSCREEN().
      javax.swing.JFrame getFrame​()
      Getter for frame
      void runAgain​()
      This method is called when Team creation is not complete and more Heroes need to be created.
      void setFrame​(javax.swing.JFrame newframe)
      setter for frame

      • runAgain

        public void runAgain​()
        This method is called when Team creation is not complete and more Heroes need to be created. Else the first city is created.

      • closeSCREEN

        public void closeSCREEN​()
        Closes up the frame and clears up this instance of HeroSetupScreen

      • finishedWindow

        public void finishedWindow​()
        This method calls closeSetupScreen of GameEnvironment class which closes the HeroSetupSCREEN using closeSCREEN().

      • createHero

        public void createHero​()
        This method creates Heroes based on the input given to it by variable typePick and heroName, and adds them to the Team
